record.content: Documentation

record.title: Installation Instructions
record.description:
Step 1: Unzip this file in your site's packages/ directory.
Step 2: Login to your site as an administrator.
Step 3: Find the "Add Functionality" page in your dashboard.
Step 4: Find this package in the list of packages awaiting installation.
Step 5: Click the "install" button.

record.title: Changing Banners
record.description:
Step 1: Put your site on edit mode.
Step 2: Click settings (Cog icon upper left).
Step 3: Click Attribute.
Step 4: Locate "Banner" option at the very bottom and click it.
Step 5: An image selection box should appear on the right.
Step 6: Choose image to replace banner.
Step 7: Save changes and publish page

record.title: Removing Banners
record.description:
Step 1: Put your site on edit mode.
Step 2: Click settings (Cog icon upper left).
Step 3: Click Attribute.
Step 4: Locate "Hide Banner" option at the very bottom and click it.
Step 5: Tick the checkbox.
Step 6: Save changes and publish page.

record.title: ​Creating Blog / Team
record.description:
This theme has sample content. The sample content has a built in blog that has been configured to help end users create blog entries.

To create a blog, locate the icon with two pages on the upper right part of your screen and select "Blog Entry". You should then be taken to the page composer. Fill all the required options. Make sure to select a path where your blog post should go. Click save and publish.

Similar steps apply when creating team page

record.title: Adding Thumbnails to Pagelists
record.description:
When creating a blog post you will automatically have the option to select an image as a thumbnail on the composer form. But what if you want to add images to pages that are not created using blog entry? Here are the steps:

Step 1: Put your site on edit mode.
Step 2: Click settings (Cog icon upper left).
Step 3: Click Attribute.
Step 4: Locate "Thumbnail" option for 5.7.4.1 and earlier. But if your version is below 5.7.4.1 the option is named "Pagelist thumbnail".
Step 5: Click the option and an image select box should appear on the right

record.title: Using Autonav Templates
record.description:
Add an autonav to the body of your page. Once the autonav is on the page click on it and click "Design & Custom Templates".

This should open up another set of icons that will help you customize the autonav block. Click on the cog icon and you should see a select box for custom templates. Here, you can choose the appropriate custom block for your autonav block.

record.title: Using Pagelist Templates
record.description:
Pagelist templates are pretty awesome! Using them is similar to how you would add an autonav template to an autonav block (See above). There are 8 pagelist custom templates and the best way to show you how they look is to click here: Pagelist Templates

Step 1: Drag a pagelist block to your page and input necessary settings and save.
Step 2: Click on it and select "Design & Custom Templates".
Step 3: Click the cog icon.
Step 4: Select a custom template.

record.title: Using Feature Templates
record.description:
The feature block is a block used to display an icon and a content. In itself, the feature block is pretty good but with the c5box feature template it adds another level of depth to your design.

Step 1: Drag a feature block to your page and input necessary settings and save.
Step 2 Click on it and select "Design & Custom Templates".
Step 3: Click the cog icon.
Step 4: Select a custom template and select from the list

record.linkTitle: Adding Page title to Banner (Inner pages)
record.title: Adding Page title to Banner
record.description:
Step 1: Go to inner page and click the banner area
Step 2: Choose Page Attribute Display block
Step 3: Add block and click on it to display more options
Step 4: Choose custom templates and select C5box_pagetitle

record.title: Adding Sticky sidebar
record.description:
Step 1: Click on an area and select add block
Step 2: Choose the FAQ block
Step 3: Add block and click on it to display more options
Step 4: Choose custom templates and select C5box_sticky

record.title: Adding Accordion
record.description:
Step 1: Click on an area and select add block
Step 2: Choose the FAQ block
Step 3: Add block and click on it to display more options
Step 4: Choose custom templates and select C5box_accordion

>

record.title: Adding newsletter form
record.description:
Step 1: Click on an area and select add block
Step 2: Choose the Form block
Step 2: Only add an email address field and add a label (will be converted to placeholder)
Step 3: Add block and click on it to display more option
Step 4: Choose custom templates and select C5box_newsletter

record.title: Using Word Flipper
record.description:
Step 1: Add a Content block
Step 2: Add text in this format "Word1|Word2|Word3|Word4"
Step 3: Highlight word and select custom styles from the WYSIWYG menu
Step 4: Choose Word Flip.
Step 5: Save, publish and reload page

record.title: Using Carousel style news/pagelist
record.description:
Step 1: Drag a pagelist block to your page and input necessary settings and save.
Step 2: Click on it and select "Design & Custom Templates".
Step 3: Click the cog icon.
Step 4: Select a custom template.
Step 5: Choose between c5box_plist_3col_carousel or c5box_plist_4col_carousel
Step 6: Save, publish and reload page

record.title: Adding fade effects on feature and pagelist blocks
record.description:
Step 1: Click pagelist or feature block and select "Design and custom templates"
Step 2: Click the magic wand icon
Step 3: Click custom class to bring out the effects

Note: Some effects are buggy on some custom pagelist

record.title: Using the parallax block
record.description:
Note: Parallax boxes looks best on Full/Wide areas

1. Select a Wide area and add block
2. Select Parallax block
3. Fill content and select image
Step 6: Save, publish and reload page

record.title: Using the Marquee image slider
record.description:
Note: Needs to be similar height and width (ideally 140px wide and 30px high)

Step 1: Select an area, preferably non-wide, and add block
Step 2: Select Image slider block
Step 3: Add image and leave Title and Description blank. Add link if you want.
Step 4: Click save.
Step 5: Go to custom templates and select c5box_marquee

record.content: Custom Pagelist Templates

page.name: Autonavs
page.description: Autonav custom templates for the header body and footer

record.content:
Autonav Custom Templates

c5box Breadcrumbs

For the purpose of showing you multiple items using the breadcrumb design, we've setup the autonav below to show the top level navigation items instead of showing the actual breadcrumb trail. To get the breadcrumb trail functionality, edit your autonav block and under sibling pages choose "display breadcrumb trail"
Body Autonavs
Default
Body Style 1
Body Style 2

Footer Autonav (Alignment)

When you add an autonav block on the footer (the last section of the website) the default autonav style will look like this:

Now if you want the autonav to align right, you have to use the custom template footer right:

For left alignment use custom template footer left:

page.name: FAQs
page.description: A list of questions and answers relating to a particular subject, especially one giving basic information for users of a website.

record.content:
FAQ Templates

Default FAQ Sample

record.linkTitle: How can I change my shipping address?
record.title: How can I change my shipping address?
record.description: By default, the last used shipping address will be saved into to your Sample Store account. When you are checking out your order, the default shipping address will be displayed and you have the option to amend it if you need to.

record.linkTitle: How do I activate my account?
record.title: How do I activate my account?
record.description: The instructions to activate your account will be sent to your email once you have submitted the registration form. If you did not receive this email, your email service provider’s mailing software may be blocking it. You can try checking your junk / spam folder or contact us at help@samplestore.com

record.linkTitle: What do you mean by points? How do I earn it?
record.title: What do you mean by points? How do I earn it?
record.description: Because you are important to us, we want to know what you think about the products. As an added value, every time you rate the products you earn points which go straight to your account. 1 point are added to your account for every review that you give. You will need those points in order to redeem the sample products. So keep rating the products to keep earning points!

record.linkTitle: Why is there a checkout limit? / What are all the checkout limits?
record.title: Why is there a checkout limit? / What are all the checkout limits?
record.description:
Sample Store is a popular spot and gets lots of shoppers at a time. These limits are in place to make sure everyone has a good time trying and purchasing their products.
So...

record.linkTitle: How can I track my orders & payment?
record.title: How can I track my orders & payment?
record.description: After logging into your account, the status of your checkout history can be found under Order History. For orders via registered postage, a tracking number (article tracking number) will be given to you after the receipt given from Singapore Post Limited(SingPost).

record.content: Accordion style FAQ

record.linkTitle: How can I change my shipping address?
record.title: How can I change my shipping address?
record.description: By default, the last used shipping address will be saved into to your Sample Store account. When you are checking out your order, the default shipping address will be displayed and you have the option to amend it if you need to.

record.linkTitle: How do I activate my account?
record.title: How do I activate my account?
record.description: The instructions to activate your account will be sent to your email once you have submitted the registration form. If you did not receive this email, your email service provider’s mailing software may be blocking it. You can try checking your junk / spam folder or contact us at help@samplestore.com

record.linkTitle: What do you mean by points? How do I earn it?
record.title: What do you mean by points? How do I earn it?
record.description: Because you are important to us, we want to know what you think about the products. As an added value, every time you rate the products you earn points which go straight to your account. 1 point are added to your account for every review that you give. You will need those points in order to redeem the sample products. So keep rating the products to keep earning points!

record.linkTitle: Why is there a checkout limit? / What are all the checkout limits?
record.title: Why is there a checkout limit? / What are all the checkout limits?
record.description:
Sample Store is a popular spot and gets lots of shoppers at a time. These limits are in place to make sure everyone has a good time trying and purchasing their products.
So...

- Each member is entitled to only one (1) sample order every day.

- Each member is entitled to one (1) bundle of sample for each product.

- Your account must have sufficient points before you can checkout the sample products.

- Kindly clear all pending payments before another checkout.

record.linkTitle: How can I track my orders & payment?
record.title: How can I track my orders & payment?
record.description: After logging into your account, the status of your checkout history can be found under Order History. For orders via registered postage, a tracking number (article tracking number) will be given to you after the receipt given from Singapore Post Limited(SingPost).

record.content: Sticky style FAQ

You will need those points in order to redeem the sample products. So keep rating the products to keep earning points!

Sample Store is a popular spot and gets lots of shoppers at a time. These limits are in place to make sure everyone has a good time trying and purchasing their products.
So...

- Each member is entitled to one (1) bundle of sample for each product.

- Your account must have sufficient points before you can checkout the sample products.

- Kindly clear all pending payments before another checkout.

record.linkTitle: How can I track my orders & payment?

record.description: After logging into your account, the status of your checkout history can be found under Order History. For orders via registered postage, a tracking number (article tracking number) will be given to you after the receipt given from Singapore Post Limited(SingPost).

record.title: ALL WE NEED IS A FRESH START
record.description: Genesis is a multipurpose concrete5 theme. It's mobile responsive and is suitable for any type of website. Extensive customization options make this theme ideal for beginners and advance users. Taking advantage of Concrete5's technology to bring users the best development experience. Fully compatible with the latest version of concrete5.

record.title: A THEME FOR ANY WEBSITE
record.description: Create any kind of website. Whether it is business, portfolio, photography, corporate, art, non-profit or landing pages, this theme will fit your need. A good documentation makes this theme a powerful tool for any Concrete5 user.

record.title: FULLY RESPONSIVE
record.description: Your website will look great in any device. A modern design that keeps up with the latest technology will give your clients a design edge over competitors. Enjoy seamless web development with this theme!

record.content: Nam nulla libero, blandit convallis varius non
RECENT NEWS

WHAT MAKES IT GREAT?

IT'S A THEME FOR ANY WEBSITE
